ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] What does the ".invalid" suffix on an ARC file mean?

Gordon Mohr (Internet Archive) writes:
> Another thought from Igor here that could explain the extra '.open'
> files: have you launched multiple crawls pointing to the same 'arcs'
> directory absolute path? (Each crawl could be responsible for up
> to 5...)

Nope, whenever I run multiple crawls on a machine I have completely
separate ARC directories, and also define different prefixes for each
crawl.
